file.name: job-statuses.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
paths:
    /job-statuses:
        get:
            summary: List job statuses.
            parameters:
                - name: jobTrackingID
                  description: Filter by a range of job tracking IDs.
                  in: query
                  schema:
                      $ref: "#/components/schemas/RangeExpression"
                - name: jobExecutionStatus
                  description: Filter by jobs with a particular status.
                  in: query
                  schema:
                      type: string
                      minLength: 1
                - name: trackingUserID
                  description: The userID that is following the jobs. Defaults to the current sessioned userID.
                  in: query
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/JobStatus"
                                type: array
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Job Statuses
    /job-statuses/poll:
        post:
            summary: |
                This is a long polling endpoint to query changed job statuses.

                ## Recommended Usage
                - Call the endpoint until it returns. It may return with some changes or no changes.
                - Continually make new requests to the endpoint until there are no more changes.
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                                jobTrackingID:
                                    description: Filter by a range of job tracking IDs.
                                    type: array
                                    items:
                                        type: integer
                                trackingUserID:
                                    description: The userID that is following the jobs. Defaults to the current sessioned userID.
                                    type: integer
                                maxDuration:
                                    description: Maximum duration to poll for in seconds.
                                    default: 10
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    updatedJobs:
                                        description: The jobs that were updated since the last time the user checked.
                                        items:
                                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/JobStatus"
                                        type: array
                                    incompleteJobCount:
                                        description: The count of remaining incomplete jobs for the user.
                                        type: number
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Job Statuses

components:
    schemas:
        JobStatus:
            type: object
            properties:
                jobStatusID:
                    description: The ID of the job status.
                    type: integer
                    example: 141141
                jobTrackingID:
                    description: The trackingID of the job.
                    type: string
                    example: queue.vanilladev.com::612d3f89dad758.69687975
                trackingUserID:
                    description: The userID tracking the job.
                    type: integer
                    example: 42415
                dateInserted:
                    description: The datetime the job was first tracked.
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
                dateUpdated:
                    description: The datetime the job status last changed.
                    format: date-time
                jobExecutionStatus:
                    description: The current status of the job.
                    type: string
                    example: "received"
                errorMessage:
                    description: An error message for the job.
                    type: string
                progressTotalQuantity:
                    description: Quantity of items that can be progressed.
                    type: integer
                    example: 100
                progressCompleteQuantity:
                    description: Quantity of items that are completed.
                    type: integer
                    example: 40
                progressFailedQuantity:
                    description: Quantity of items that have failed.
                    type: integer
            required:
                - jobStatusID
                - jobTrackingID
                - trackingUserID
                - dateInserted
                - dateUpdated
                - jobExecutionStatus
        JobSchedulerResponse:
            type: object
            properties:
                trackingSlips:
                    type: array
                    items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                            jobTrackingID:
                                type: string
                                description: Tracking id of the job. You can check its status with the /api/v2/job-statuses endpoints.
                            jobID:
                                type: string
                                description: ID of the job.
                            jobExecutionStatus:
                                type: string
                                description: Status of the job execution. This will likely be "received" at this point in time.
                                example: received
                        required:
                            - jobTrackingID
                            - jobID
                            - jobExecutionStatus

Error: parse: paths: /job-statuses: get: : parameters: parse parameter "jobTrackingID": schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/RangeExpression": resolve reference "#/components/schemas/RangeExpression": schema not found
